channel.title: Login?!?!?
channel.description:
null null null null null null null null null null null null null
when i try to connect to my server from a new account for some reason it nulls out and just keeps saying null over and over until i shut down the server, but if i copy and paste a char file and change the name and pass it lets me login?
oh and if i do shut it down after a while it will give me a char file with nothing in it

item.title: Login?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Something was wrong with the older file. If it happens again, then just copy and paste the working and nulled file here so we can compare (of course hide the pass word). It could just be a parsing error. Could you also try to find the player loading method for us?

Read full topic
